summary: [Blocked 2025-10-07] Link governance bindings to concrete receipts in a concise L4 brief (waiting on systemic backlog guard)

steps.title: Map existing L4 bindings to enforcement receipts
steps.notes: Collect current bindings, the enforcing tests/guards, and gaps that still rely on manual review.

steps.title: Draft concise explainer with traceable references
steps.notes: Write the brief that ties each binding to tests, docs, or automation receipts so reviewers can audit quickly.

steps.title: Publish brief and integrate into governance workflow
steps.notes: Attach the brief to governance/systemic-order docs and ensure planner/manager tooling links to it.

checkpoint.description: L4 binding explainer published with links to enforcing receipts
